refnamediv.refpurpose: A graphical view of serial audio feeds from services like Podiobooks.com.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: svview provides the user of a serial audio feed service acess on thier desktop. The interface displays available the user's serial audio feed subscriptions on a service and displays a formated feed for each when chosen. The interface allows the update serial audio feed subscriptions from a service. The interface also allows the user to listen or download available serial audio episodes from a selected feed.
